title: Extend Battery Life Routine
content:
I just want to ask - Is there any way to set Extended Battery Life routine schedule turn on and off in night till morning?
If not then please add this feature to the Extended Battery Life so that we can just schedule the time over night to morning like from 10PM to 5AM it turned on and after that it automatically turned off.
It will be very helpful and extend the Battery juice for some while.
